subject: svn commit: samba-web r1112 - in trunk/security: .
body:
Author: jerry
Date: 2007-05-14 19:53:48 +0000 (Mon, 14 May 2007)
New Revision: 1112

WebSVN: http://websvn.samba.org/cgi-bin/viewcvs.cgi?view=rev&root=samba-web&rev=1112

Log:
Clarification of bug discovery at request of Brian @ ZDI
Modified:
   trunk/security/CVE-2007-2446.html


Changeset:
Modified: trunk/security/CVE-2007-2446.html
===================================================================
--- trunk/security/CVE-2007-2446.html	2007-05-14 13:22:20 UTC (rev 1111)
+++ trunk/security/CVE-2007-2446.html	2007-05-14 19:53:48 UTC (rev 1112)
@@ -64,9 +64,9 @@
 Credits
 =======
 
-This vulnerability was reported to Samba developers by Brian
-Schafer, TippingPoint Security Response Lead, as part
-of the Zero Day Initiative (http://www.zerodayinitiative.com).
+This vulnerability was discovered by an anonymous researcher and reported 
+to Samba developers by Brian Schafer, TippingPoint Security Response Lead, 
+as part of the Zero Day Initiative (http://www.zerodayinitiative.com).
 
 The time line is as follows:
